thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net
thread.title: Luigi

author: Luigi
title: Luigi
text:
Pre-ordered breath of the wild. unfortunately, i didn't receive notification when the game finally released that it was shipped, so i contacted them. I was just looking to make sure that it was shipped out before the day was done, or confirmation that it had been.
Not only did it get confirmed as being shipped, they also waived my S&H fee, and then gave me two additional codes to save money at a later time. Beyond impressed with how they handle their business.
